personas.name: Agent Orchestrator
personas.description: Spends all day correcting the 'intelligent' mistakes of autonomous systems.
personas.evolvedDescription: You don't just manage bots; you compose symphonies from the discord of automation. You find the human note in the digital noise.

personas.name: Coffee Badger
personas.description: Masters the art of being visible for the free snacks and invisible for the actual work.
personas.evolvedDescription: Your presence isn't about avoiding work; it's about creating the random collisions that spark breakthrough ideas. You are the human algorithm for innovation.

personas.name: Resenteeism Rogue
personas.description: Mentally quit months ago, but the paycheck has a magnetic personality.
personas.evolvedDescription: You endure the corporate storms with a quiet strength. Your resilience is a testament to the human spirit's ability to find purpose even in the absurd.

personas.name: Pyromancer of Files
personas.description: Finds catharsis in mass-deleting legacy documents and ignoring the screams from legal.
personas.evolvedDescription: You don't just shred paper; you curate mental space. You are the fire that clears the brush so new ideas can grow.

personas.name: Human Legacy Asset
personas.description: Basically a vintage classic. Too expensive to maintain, too iconic to replace.
personas.evolvedDescription: You are not outdated; you are the foundation. You carry the stories, the lessons, and the soul of the company that no database can ever hold.

personas.name: Meeting Marathoner
personas.description: Survives back-to-back-to-back meetings on nothing but stale coffee and the sheer will to appear engaged.
personas.evolvedDescription: Your true skill is weaving disparate conversations into a coherent strategy. You are the voice of clarity in a sea of talk.

personas.name: Inbox Zero Paladin
personas.description: Believes the only good email is an archived email. Wields 'Mark as Read' with holy righteousness.
personas.evolvedDescription: You protect your team's most valuable asset: their attention. Your quest for zero is a crusade against distraction.

personas.name: CC Cleric
personas.description: Copies the entire department on every email to 'ensure alignment' and create a paper trail of plausible deniability.
personas.evolvedDescription: You ensure that knowledge is never siloed. Your meticulous records are the bedrock of team accountability and shared understanding.

personas.name: Buzzword Bard
personas.description: Speaks entirely in corporate jargon. Is currently 'leveraging synergies' to 'ideate a paradigm shift'.
personas.evolvedDescription: You use the language of the business to paint a picture of the future. You give the team a shared vocabulary to build what's next.

personas.name: Plain-Speaker Monk
personas.description: Communicates with infuriating clarity, cutting through buzzwords and exposing the simple, uncomfortable truth.
personas.evolvedDescription: You possess the rare courage to be direct. Your clarity is a gift that dispels confusion and accelerates progress.
